about.title: About Me
description: Mathematician by education. Until 2003 worked at the Institute of Mathematics of the National Academy of Sciences. Over the next 10 years went from a sales manager to the head of a distribution company (FMCG).
In 2013 moved to internet marketing. Participated in the promotion of several educational projects. Since 2016 I`ve been doing what I really like â€” web development and UX design.
